name: Creepy Monster Run Horror - Awesome Scary Hunter Dash Game For Teen Boys Free
name_original: Creepy Monster Run Horror - Awesome Scary Hunter Dash Game For Teen Boys Free
description:
Tyler - "This game is creepy, but I couldn't stop playing it!"

Obviously you are new here. So let me explain what you are doing here...
You are in charge of watching over the Friendly FunZone during the night shift.
Things have been fine for the first little bit, but now you notice some changes in the behavior of some of the robots. Last night was by far the worst that you had experienced so far, but things are escalating... and your shift just started...

Can you last?
